name: Loco-Locomotive
description:
Loco-Locomotive is a cooperative action game where up to four players must defend a moving railway locomotive from alien attacks by coordinating various tasks, such as firing turrets, restocking ammunition, refueling the train, and making repairs. You'll win if you manage to prevent the destruction of your train while keeping the fuel full before time runs out. Good luck and teamwork is key!

The gameplay of Loco-Locomotive takes inspiration from numerous games such as Lovers in a Dangerous Spacetime, Overcooked, Space Invaders, We Need to Go Deeper, and Guns of Icarus.

Created as a student project for the Spring 2020 - Winter 2021 video game production course in Lasalle College Vancouver.

   

Created by: Cyro Paulino da Costa Junior, Henry Liao, Ka Meng Lei, Kefan Wu, and RunYi Guo

Artwork by: RunYi Guo

Music & SFX by: Micah Meuleman
